name: Ghosts of Hollow Creek (Alpha Demo Scene 1 and Scene 2)
name_original: Ghosts of Hollow Creek (Alpha Demo Scene 1 and Scene 2)
description:
Ghosts of Hollow Creek (Alpha Demo) is an old-school RPG video game where you can customize all the characters of your party (as well as the potential love interest of the main character in the story)  and the main story has multiple endings depending on your choices.

This demo allows you to play through the first 2 scenes, all classes are available for play. Please bear in mind this game is in the early Alpha phase so while it should be stable (from my testing it runs fine),  things will likely change before the final release (e.g. refining balance, adding more skills to each class, etc.)

Thank you, and have fun!
